attributes.action: Let the police use more force when chasing or catching a violent person.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allow the police to use reasonable force when confronted with abusive or threatening people, the reason is, far to many police resources are used when apprehending such people, the police have to make sure that the person whom they are chasing/Dealing with are not hurt in anyway.  Let’s stop the kid gloves when these people are abusive or violent. Far too much is now based on the criminals Rights what about the law enforcers rights?
A tougher stance should make people think twice when the police are present.
